author: snowhill
title: scuba in tarkarli
text: # 1 i want to make a trip in tarkarli on 24 to 28th october this year with my family and i want to do scuba.may i know when the scuba will start in this year in tarkarli. somebody told me it would be started at october 1st week; or someone telling that november 1st week. is there any perfect time for scuba in tarkarli. please advice me - otherwise i can't finalize my dates for this trip as well as booking a resort also. and also i want to know about the salgaokar beach resort in deobag beach.i have seen their site and picture and i like the location & room also; but i couldn't find any reviews of this resort on any site.any one can sort me out a resort or hotel or homestay just right on the beach on that area.my budget is 2200/- per night (maximum) for lodging.
